hints.content:
Let's rewrite each value in standard form:

$\text{\blueD{Twenty six thousand, sixty-two}}=\blueD{26{,}062}$

$\tealE{20{,}000+6{,}000 + 60 + 2}=\tealE{26{,}062}$

Now, we can use a place value chart to compare the numbers.

Ten Thousands| Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\blueD2$ | $\blueD6$ | $\blueD0$ | $\blueD6$  | $\blueD2$ 
$\tealE2$ | $\tealE6$ | $\tealE0$ | $\tealE6$ | $\tealE2$
